thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 4 of 389
thread.title: AJ

author: AJ
title: AJ
text: I've used Home Advisor a whole bunch of times in the last few years and the tradespeople they've connected me with have always been awesome. Finding a pro is just a few clicks and in most cases you can have them call you immediately to schedule (or, in the case of an AC repair after hours, a Home Advisor rep called me instantly and was able to set an appointment to have work done first-thing in the morning). Recommend them highly.
